Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Grand. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Grand.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Fullerton
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Fullerton due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Fullerton due to a mechanical problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
